Source: InvestmentPitch.com

Description: Ashton Addison speaks with Amos Whitewolf, Tech Leader and Game Breaker at Perion, on their ecosystem for connecting high level gamers in the play 2 earn space with investors and the GameFi economy. We discuss current Play 2 Earn games, their strategy moving forward and the growth of Blockchain GamingLearn more: https://perion.gg
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3smitv4
